TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents information about a WMI property.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example lists information about the **Win32_OperatingSystem** class using the <xref:System.Management.PropertyData> class. For more information about **Win32_OperatingSystem**, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsArray As Boolean
public: property bool IsArray { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the property is an array.
Docs.value: Returns a value indicating whether the property is an array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value `true` if the property is an array; otherwise, `false`.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
